entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 39 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
